entry.content:
Bio

I am an Invited Assistant Professor at Instituto Superior TÃ©cnico - Universidade de Lisboa, researcher at the Distributed Systems Group (GSD) of INESC-ID and a member of DCentral.Â 

I have a BSc and a MSc in Informatics Engineering from Faculdade de CiÃªncias da Universidade de Lisboa and a PhD in Computer Sciences and Engineering from Instituto Superior TÃ©cnico.Â 

As a researcher I participated in the following projects: PATI, SITAN, SafeClou,Â SEAL and BIG ERA Chair.

My research interests are related with distributed systems, cybersecurity and cloud. More specifically, I have been researching novel intrusion recovery methods for applications and systems running in the cloud environment.Â

entry.title: Projects
entry.summary: BIG RaaS - Recovery as a Service Under development The Recovery as a Service project will focus on the development of novel techniques and mechanisms to recover from intrusions in public clouds. These mechanisms take into account the constraints of public clouds like: the incapacity…
entry.content:
BIG

RaaS - Recovery as a Service

Under development

The Recovery as a Service project will focus on the development of novel techniques and mechanisms to recover from intrusions in public clouds. These mechanisms take into account the constraints of public clouds like: the incapacity to modify the source code of the platform, since it is maintained by a third party and provided to users as a service; the heterogeneity of the different cloud service models, which makes it infeasible to adopt a single solution that fits all use cases; the existence of a third party that manages and maintains the cloud platform, restricting the control of the platform.

The RaaS project was submitted to the FCT 2020 Call for SR&TD Project Grants with an overall rating of 7.0. It will be resubmitted to the next call in 2021.



Safecloud

SEAL
